title: 65-Year-Olds Look Younger Every Day Thanks to This $14 Retinol Cream
text:
Credit: Getty Images
Aging is inevitable, and visible signs are part of the package— wrinkles and fine lines will greet your skin whether you like it or not. While you can’t control how your complexion matures, you can take charge of how you care for it . It’s never too late to upgrade your beauty regimen , and Amazon is brimming with effective products worth adding to your lineup. Not sure where to start? Grab this shopper-loved Arvesa retinol cream while it's on sale for $14 on Amazon.
The moisturizer is bound to become your new go-to for both morning and night use, considering it’s packed with skin care superstars. As its name suggests, it contains retinol to smooth and tighten your complexion, along with collagen and hyaluronic acid to deeply hydrate and plump your skin. As a result, these ingredients leave you with firmer, softer results; apply it twice daily after cleansing to experience the magic for yourself (don't forget to follow it with sunscreen during the day).
Arvesa Retinol Day and Night Cream Amazon
$17 $14 at Amazon The discounted cream is adored by customers, with more than 4,400 five-star ratings. A 65-year-old shopper said they “look younger every day” thanks to the “age-defying” product, which smoothed their skin after constant use. A second fan said the moisturizer makes their “67-year-old skin feel so good” and “tightens fine lines that come with age.” Another shopper in their 60s confirmed it “definitely improved the lines and wrinkles on [their] face,” adding that it’s “light” and leaves their skin “feeling fresh.”
Reviewers of all ages and skin types swear by the Arvesa pick. A 78-year-old said they have “soft and young skin” and “don’t look” their age with regular use of the cream, which leaves them with a “radiant” complexion. One customer with eczema deemed the formula the “best product” they’ve found for their “dry face,” since it’s so “moisturizing and restoring.” If you’re still on the fence, take it from another shopper who called the cream a “miracle worker” after it restored their “youthful glow” and left a “huge difference” in their skin.
